The below tally shows a comparison of detector flux to particles flagged from
the Be sphere:

                       total               flagged
      energy
    1.0000E-10   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    1.7557E-10   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000

      total      1.80014E-05 0.0327   1.80014E-05 0.0327

It is clear that all particles contributing to flux in the detector have
already passed through the Be sphere.

However, let's look at how many flux-scoring particles are flagged in the
water:

                       total               flagged
      energy
    1.0000E-10   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    1.7557E-10   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    3.0824E-10   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    5.4117E-10   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    9.5012E-10   2.52669E-09 1.0000   2.52669E-09 1.0000
    1.6681E-09   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000

    2.7826E-08   2.98835E-07 0.1916   3.24178E-08 0.6028

    8.5770E-08   6.35785E-07 0.1507   1.61028E-07 0.3005
    1.5058E-07   3.44487E-07 0.1962   3.41188E-08 0.5961
    2.6438E-07   2.08501E-07 0.2725   1.10448E-07 0.3685

    1.4307E-06   1.75018E-07 0.3107   1.09460E-07 0.4011

    7.3564E-05   2.37801E-07 0.2415   1.53875E-07 0.2881

    3.9811E-04   1.69488E-07 0.2490   1.32977E-07 0.2858
    6.9895E-04   2.34960E-07 0.2617   1.89471E-07 0.2901
    1.2271E-03   3.38734E-07 0.2187   2.49234E-07 0.2468
    2.1544E-03   3.39703E-07 0.2276   2.53564E-07 0.2667
    3.7825E-03   1.55559E-07 0.2605   1.33331E-07 0.2686
    6.6408E-03   1.88855E-07 0.2467   1.35868E-07 0.2802
    1.1659E-02   3.32051E-07 0.2082   2.64462E-07 0.2380
    2.0470E-02   2.73090E-07 0.2643   1.97610E-07 0.3048
    3.5938E-02   3.65808E-07 0.2056   2.60206E-07 0.2456
    6.3096E-02   2.87705E-07 0.2339   1.94565E-07 0.2679

    1.9449E-01   4.28748E-07 0.1990   3.08120E-07 0.2423
    3.4145E-01   6.43011E-07 0.1642   4.72810E-07 0.1957
    5.9948E-01   1.08533E-06 0.1318   7.55927E-07 0.1584
    1.0525E+00   1.07325E-06 0.1302   7.17652E-07 0.1532
    1.8478E+00   1.13071E-06 0.1173   6.12070E-07 0.1562
    3.2442E+00   9.11162E-07 0.1348   5.54182E-07 0.1645
    5.6958E+00   1.33621E-06 0.1120   9.80465E-07 0.1290
    1.0000E+01   1.45667E-06 0.1049   9.81448E-07 0.1264
    1.2000E+01   7.25284E-07 0.1470   4.23732E-07 0.1904
    1.4000E+01   1.88229E-06 0.0953   6.79623E-07 0.1562
    1.6000E+01   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    1.8000E+01   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
    2.0000E+01   0.00000E+00 0.0000   0.00000E+00 0.0000
      total      1.80014E-05 0.0327   1.06643E-05 0.0422

So, of the 1.8E-5 contribution to flux in the detector, 1.06643E-5 of this
came through the water and did not stream DIRECTLY to the detector.

So, the total flux that streamed directly is the difference between the total
and flagged columns in this second table (i.e. total - flagged).
